verses.verse: Hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068>, ye children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>: for the LORD<WH3068> hath a controversy<WH7379> with the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land<WH776>, because there is no truth<WH571>, nor mercy<WH2617>, nor knowledge<WH1847> of God<WH430> in the land<WH776>.

By swearing<WH422>, and lying<WH3584>, and killing<WH7523>, and stealing<WH1589>, and committing adultery<WH5003>, they break out<WH6555>, and blood<WH1818> toucheth<WH5060> blood<WH1818>. blood: Heb. bloods

Therefore shall the land<WH776> mourn<WH56>, and every one that dwelleth<WH3427> therein shall languish<WH535>, with the beasts<WH2416> of the field<WH7704>, and with the fowls<WH5775> of heaven<WH8064>; yea, the fishes<WH1709> of the sea<WH3220> also shall be taken away<WH622>.
Yet let no man<WH376> strive<WH7378>, nor reprove<WH3198> another<WH376>: for thy people<WH5971> are as they that strive<WH7378> with the priest<WH3548>.

Therefore shalt thou fall<WH3782> in the day<WH3117>, and the prophet<WH5030> also shall fall<WH3782> with thee in the night<WH3915>, and I will destroy<WH1820> thy mother<WH517>. destroy: Heb. cut off

My people<WH5971> are destroyed<WH1820> for lack of knowledge<WH1847>: because thou hast rejected<WH3988> knowledge<WH1847>, I will also reject<WH3988> thee, that thou shalt be no priest<WH3547> to me: seeing thou hast forgotten<WH7911> the law<WH8451> of thy God<WH430>, I will also forget<WH7911> thy children<WH1121>. destroyed: Heb. cut off
As they were increased<WH7230>, so they sinned<WH2398> against me: therefore will I change<WH4171> their glory<WH3519> into shame<WH7036>.
They eat up<WH398> the sin<WH2403> of my people<WH5971>, and they set<WH5375> their heart<WH5315> on their iniquity<WH5771>. set: Heb. lift up their soul to

And there shall be, like people<WH5971>, like priest<WH3548>: and I will punish<WH6485> them for their ways<WH1870>, and reward<WH7725> them their doings<WH4611>. punish: Heb. visit upon reward: Heb. cause to return

For they shall eat<WH398>, and not have enough<WH7646>: they shall commit whoredom<WH2181>, and shall not increase<WH6555>: because they have left off<WH5800> to take heed<WH8104> to the LORD<WH3068>.
Whoredom<WH2184> and wine<WH3196> and new wine<WH8492> take away<WH3947> the heart<WH3820>.

My people<WH5971> ask<WH7592> counsel at their stocks<WH6086>, and their staff<WH4731> declareth<WH5046> unto them: for the spirit<WH7307> of whoredoms<WH2183> hath caused them to err<WH8582>, and they have gone a whoring<WH2181> from under their God<WH430>.

They sacrifice<WH2076> upon the tops<WH7218> of the mountains<WH2022>, and burn incense<WH6999> upon the hills<WH1389>, under oaks<WH437> and poplars<WH3839> and elms<WH424>, because the shadow<WH6738> thereof is good<WH2896>: therefore your daughters<WH1323> shall commit whoredom<WH2181>, and your spouses<WH3618> shall commit adultery<WH5003>.

I will not punish<WH6485> your daughters<WH1323> when they commit whoredom<WH2181>, nor your spouses<WH3618> when they commit adultery<WH5003>: for themselves are separated<WH6504> with whores<WH2181>, and they sacrifice<WH2076> with harlots<WH6948>: therefore the people<WH5971> that doth not understand<WH995> shall fall<WH3832>. I will not: or, Shall I not fall: or, be punished

Though thou, Israel<WH3478>, play the harlot<WH2181>, yet let not Judah<WH3063> offend<WH816>; and come<WH935> not ye unto Gilgal<WH1537>, neither go ye up<WH5927> to Bethaven<WH1007>, nor swear<WH7650>, The LORD<WH3068> liveth<WH2416>.
For Israel<WH3478> slideth back<WH5637> as a backsliding<WH5637> heifer<WH6510>: now the LORD<WH3068> will feed<WH7462> them as a lamb<WH3532> in a large place<WH4800>.
Ephraim<WH669> is joined<WH2266> to idols<WH6091>: let him alone<WH3240>.

Their drink<WH5435> is sour<WH5493>: they have committed whoredom<WH2181> continually<WH2181>: her rulers<WH4043> with shame<WH7036> do love<WH157>, Give<WH3051> ye. sour: Heb. gone rulers: Heb. shields
The wind<WH7307> hath bound her up<WH6887> in her wings<WH3671>, and they shall be ashamed<WH954> because of their sacrifices<WH2077>.
